import { useState } from "react" import './NewItemForm.css' const NewItemForm = ({addItem}) => { const INITIALSTATE = { type:'', name:'', description:'', recipe:'', serve:'' } const [formData,setFormData] = useState(INITIALSTATE) const handleChange = e => { const {name,value} = e.target setFormData(data => ({ ...data, [name]: value })) } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); const {name,description,recipe,serve,type} = formData; setFormData(INITIALSTATE) addItem(type,{name,description,recipe,serve}) } return (

Add an Item to our menu!

) } export default NewItemForm;
